documentType: bureau of prisons count sheet and inmate roster
summary: This document consists of Bureau of Prisons count sheets and inmate rosters from the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York on August 9, 2019. It includes a count sheet showing a total inmate census of 760 and an inmate roster listing at least two inmates by their register numbers, one of whom (register number 76256-054) is categorized under 'SUICIDE OR UNASSG' (Suicide Observation or Unassigned).

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Inmate listed on the roster with register number 76256-054 under the assignment category 'HOSP' and operational category 'SUICIDE OR UNASSG' on August 9, 2019.

events.title: Daily inmate count at MCC New York
events.description: Official inmate count conducted at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, showing a total census of 760 inmates across various housing units.

events.title: Jeffrey Epstein on suicide watch/unassigned status
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein (register number 76256-054) is listed on the inmate roster with an assignment of 'HOSP' and an operational category of 'SUICIDE OR UNASSG', indicating he was under observation or unassigned.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, NY
keyFacts: The document is dated August 9, 2019, the day Jeffrey Epstein was found dead in his cell.
Jeffrey Epstein's inmate register number (76256-054) appears on a roster with the operational category 'SUICIDE OR UNASSG' (Suicide Observation or Unassigned).
An official inmate count for the MCC New York facility shows a total census of 760 inmates across housing units like B-A, C-A, K-N, K-S, etc.
The document includes standard Bureau of Prisons forms for inmate counts and rosters, indicating routine administrative procedures.
Another inmate listed (register number 48816-066) is also categorized under 'SUICIDE OR UNASSG' on the same date.
